sentences: Jani Stefanovic (born 23 May 1979) is a Swedish multi-instrumentalist that primarily plays Swedish death metal.
Jani started playing around the age of 13–14 years old.
Jani was born in Gothenburg, Sweden to a Finnish mother and a Serbian father.
He moved to Helsinki, Finland in 1993 with his mom, little brother and sister.
Jani moved back to Gothenburg, Sweden in 2000.
After joining Sins of omission in 2002 he moved to Stockholm.
Jani Stefanovic is married to fellow artist Katja Stefanovic a singer songwriter from Finland.
